content.question: Based on the soil texture triangle, which of the following would describe soil that was <math alttext="25%" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>25</mn> <mo>%</mo> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> clay, <math alttext="25%" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> silt, and <math alttext="50%" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> sand?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe characteristics of an environmental concept, process, or model represented visually.
